question:
\(2x \neq y\)
\(5x \neq 4y\)
What is the value of \(\frac{\frac{5x-4y}{2x-y}}{\frac{3y}{y-2x} + 5}\) ?
A. \(\frac{1}{2}\)
B. \(\frac{3}{2}\)
C. \(\frac{5}{2}\)
D. \(\frac{7}{2}\)
E. \(\frac{9}{2}\)
Show
Hide
Answer
